body:
So this game is simple
Curse the wish of the player above you

Example:
"I wish for a hotdog"
"Wish Granted, but your dog ate the hotdog before you" "I wish to become the best Minecraft PVPer"
"Wish Granted, but every server banned you for using autoclicker but you didn't"
And so on

I'll start
I wish that an avicus team wins the tournament
body_tagged:
So this game is simple
Curse the wish of the player above you

Example:
"I wish for a hotdog"
"Wish Granted, but your dog ate the hotdog before you" "I wish to become the best Minecraft PVPer"
"Wish Granted, but every server banned you for using autoclicker but you didn't"
And so on

I'll start
I wish that an avicus team wins the tournament
title: [Game] Cursed Wishes/Corrupt a Wish
